body: its just a doujin gents. Dont marry hoes if u want a happy life

This is Great one👌 it's an actual plot, a relatable protag that isn't a loser, a married man that isn't a cuck and is actively working out his mixed feelings about his wife's past. The wife herself isn't just a dumb broad but has character, WTF is this Gemstone of a Doujin?
